I had the California chicken and buffalo wings and for the price and taste i will come back. the service was friendly and i love the idea of the top level dinning. One draw back was no fountain drinks with small med or large just cans or bottles.
author: Hervey H.

description: I like it hot and spicy!!  Get your mind out of the gutter, I'm talking about buffalo wings!  For those who like their wings HOT, you need to brave their inferno buffalo wings..it's got a real kick to it!  Hot crispy wings drenched in their house made super spicy buffalo wing sauce. YUMMY! Their signature burger, the double decker is good as well; they use all natural beef by Niman Ranch which is another plus.  I had the double decker without cheese, but added bacon..mmm!!   Two succulent patties topped with bacon, lettuce, and tomato on a fluffy, lightly toasted kaiser bun.  Are you drooling yet?!  Their thick cut fries are fried when ordered, so they come out hot and crispy!   I prefer this place over Flipper's, the food is way better and the owners are really nice and friendly!
author: Pegs C.

description: I work around the corner from these guys and its my favorite new lunch place. Today I couldn't get out to pick up my food for about 45 minutes after I'd called the order in and when I finally got there they were already cooking me a fresh burger. I thought that was very thoughtful and excellent sevice. I go there because the beef is from Neiman Ranch and really high quality and yummy compared to other choices in the neighborhood.
author: Desiree G.

description: This isn't for the food, it's for the fact that they advertise delivery when they actually have a 2-mile radius limitation. And this I only found out after reading a ton of reviews and building up a real desire for wings and chips. Delivery folks? Um, people in the Richmond really do live in San Francisco...
author: David B.

description:
Double Decker is becoming one of my favorite spots. Their burgers are great. They taste good and the prices are reasonable. However, its not the burgers that bring me to this place. Their wings are great and so are the garlic fries. The prices are very good. 

Order yourself a burger and split an order of wings with your friends. I personally like to mix my wings between mild and spicy. They have one thats even hotter but I haven't tried it yet.  

They also have water on hand in the upstairs dining area which is useful when those wings start to get to you. 

Another cool thing about Double Decker is that the staff are pretty cool people. Oh yea... they have big screen tv's both upstairs and downstairs. Go check them out.
author: Giacomo R.

description: Just ordered a delivery from there.  Very delicious and juicy burger and amazing chicken wings!
author: gabriela l.

description:
New burger joint in the Hayes..thought I give it a try. Ordered their special double decker burger, onion rings, and their shake. Man, that was good.
Struck a conversation with the workers and found out they use organic beef for their patties and Mitchell's ice cream for their milkshakes. Juicy burgers, crunchy rings, tasty shakes, and good prices. What else can you ask for? 
Mama, don't cook tonight....let's head back to Double Decker for dinner!
author: Gabriel C.

description:
aaahhhh Wednesday afternoon 
my friends and i have made it a tradition to go to DD every Wednesday and partake in the all you can eat wings from 4-8 

it only sucks that they had to raise their prices because so many people were taking advantage of the 2 dollar beers and 50% off all side orders!! now its 25% off side orders and beer so its not as money saving as it was 

but i love the onion rings friends AND HOME MADE CHIPS!!!!! and the wings are really good too. 

so if any single ladies wanna come and hang out ill be there Wednesdays! haha
author: Steven T.

description: Great burgers and fries.  I like them better than Flippers around the corner.
author: Clem L.

description:
This place is amazing!  Monday through Friday 3-6 is the time to go.
Beers on tap are $1.61, all sides are half off there already low price and the buffalo dozen is half off.  What a deal.  
The service is great to.  Place an order and then head upstairs and they'll bring you the food.
author: Dominic P.

description:
big fat zero.  avoid this crap hole. went with friends tonight 42degrees out and raining.  asked to have the front door closed to stay off the chill...dude refused to close the front door because 'we cant' - what the 'f'?  went upstairs to wait for food. every table had crap on it - filthy dirty and freezing ass cold.
4o minutes to wait for a burger? are you kidding me?  we were the only people waiting in the ice box!   crappy attitude - zero -- crappy customer service - zero   cold food - dude the burger was so cold you could literally taste the grease seperately from the 'neiman' meat - doubt its neiman - a huge azz  zero -zero - filthy establishment - zero .   
avoid this crap hole-
author: miguel p.

description: OK, first of all it's a Niman Ranch patty and that's why you pay the $8. I would take that any day over some burger that I don't know what meat they used. Second, it was perfectly moist, no extra drippings. Very tasty. Fries were good too. Didn't really like the sauce for the hot wings. It tasted like 90% tobasco sauce as opposed to creating a more unique hot sauce, but I still give them 5 stars as everything else was perfect and delicious.
author: Victoria A.

description: INFERNOOOOOOOOOOOO! If you want spicy buffalo wings. INFERNO is no joke. I love spicy food and can handle most of them but INFERNO knocked me out. Their burgers are good. Not sure what kind of patty they use but its seasoned very well. INFERNO!!!!11!!!!
author: Tae K.

description: My old wing place shut down, and I have been looking for a worthy substitute, and Double Decker came through for me! One minute I was checking out the menu on line, the next the dude was at my door!! Teriyaki Burger was yummy and the onion rings were still HOT...I know.... I can't stand it either, maybe it was a good day, but it was a great delivery experience for me.
author: Daniel J.

description: a good hidden jem in the hayes valley.....everything from hot wings/burgers/onions rings/salads & beers on tap.....its literally rite next to a days in hotel lol...u got the lil downstairs/upstairs action...good place to watch the game even tho they have one flatscreen on each floor...did i mention the outdoor seating on a sunny day
author: elmer d.

description: Great place, especially with all the expensive options in Hayes Valley.  The burger I had was very good and the fires were excellent.  The have an AWESOME Happy Hour.  1/2 off all sides, buffalo wing dozen, and tap beers!  That means $1.50 beers from 3-6 m-f !!!
author: Marianne J.

description: Love love love Double Decker! The burgers are just lovely and the fries are just delicious. Their home made chiips are fantastic and the wings are sooo yummy! They will deiver to about 2 miles from their location. I love that they are never crouded when I go. But that is also the kiss of death for a busness. I hope more and more folks try them out. Id hate to loose such a great place.  We went there for lunch durring the pride parade and it was empty. We had the whole place to ourselves. Which was welcomed after making your way through the madness of the pride celebration.
author: Dennis V.

description: kinda small wings and not that much value for money.  the large chips were better than those from original buffalo wings but they gave less than original buffalo wings.  the burgers were good, but the garlic fries were kinda soggy and tasted a bit stale.
author: Steve L.

description: Great service, chicken wings very good and just like we make them back East.  Western Burger so tasty!  Will recommend this to our friends!
author: J D.

description: This place made me eat beef again. I would order the veggie, the bf would order beef. Usually, I could handle that. But here, the burger looked so perfectly done  -- meaty but not too much meat (no to thick patties!), fresh fixings, tempting aroma....oh, I must stop. So yes, 10 years of no beef eating gone because of Doubledecker. The place also sports the nicest staff and incredibly considerate delivery service. Still eating beef, but gotta say  mostly just Doubledecker burgers.
author: A S.

description: there potato salad ,wings,and chips are awesome!!i recommend those 3 things if u go there!!
author: nike s.

description: i got the double burger with onion rings and fries and they were all cooked to perfection! their burger was juicy and the meat was equal size to the bun (very important to me - hate the burger joints where the bun overlaps the meat,) the onion rings were big, hot, and flavorful. i could taste the onion AND the batter...yum! their homemade fries were also great. i topped off my meal with a thick strawberry shake...ahhhh...i'm done.
author: R K.

description: i'm still down with this place: great sandwiches and friendly service. however, i've noticed that the wings seem a lot smaller than before (effects of the recession?). anyways, the hot sauce (i don't dare go back to the inferno) gave me a stomach ache. it wasn't the spice, just something was off. i still recommend this place, but maybe i'll hesitate a little on the wings.
author: stephen a.

description: burgers were good, price was decent.  the only complaint was the wait.  although the counter guy was really nice about it, after $2 drinks at Jade all i wanted was food NOW!  They seemed to be really busy with phone orders, so i guess it's really not their fault.  I'll def. go back for more.
author: Lorena G.

description: Excellent!  Fast and friendly service and delicious, fresh food at this small Hayes Valley burger and wings joint.  They're a welcome addition to the lunch options in the neighborhood, and may have found the right combination to succeed in their Days Inn location.
author: Mike W.

description: i absolutely love this place   the perfect lunch spot   with a choice of wings or burgers made with the freshest prime select meats and side orders to die for   fresh cut french fries chips and onion rings   who could ask for more   the prices are quite reasonable for hayes valley and theres an upstair lounge seating area   customer service rocks   they are always willing to go the extra mile to keep you happy and the order is always right   im new to this place but i highly recommend you stop in for a burger and fries   you wont be disappointed!
author: Sarita C.

description:
i haven't had a good burger like that since Chi town!  great quality beef, awesome fries w/ the skins-yes!!!
great delivery service- i'll be callin' again.
author: Claire B.
